segments.text: How do I use this adhesive ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is a special adhesive for easing the pain . Apply it to the painful area and change it in every 2 days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do I use the lotion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Apply some of the ointment , and rub it into the skin .
segments.speaker: S2
